title: Urgot's Ultimate is unnecessarily repulsive
body:
So I played my first games against the new Urgot and his ultimate is beyond repulsive. The first time I saw it activate I started dry heaving and almost threw up. The next time it went off I had the sense to shift my camera away from the fight. Needless to say I was a liability to my team because I physically could not play the game when Urgot's ult activates. I'm not sure who felt that a meat grinder is within the thematic's of League, but I've never played this game and ever felt like sicking violence and gore had a place in it. So an hour later when I was thinking more clearly I filled a support ticket. I was pleasantly surprised when a very helpful Rioter told me that I should post here as "the developers look at the boards on occasion and might take this into consideration and maybe do something about this". So here I am, but in the mean time waste I'll be wasting my ban on Urgot and never playing blind again. I'm not sure why such a gratuitous and repulsive ability even has a place in this game, but them's the breaks. 

Silver lining in all this is riot's support far exceeded any of my expectations props to them!
